multistructural.description: Create a function that takes an array as input initializes a sum variable to zero iterates through each element in the array adds each element to the sum and returns the final sum.

segmentation.explanation_portion: Create a function that takes an array as input
initializes a sum variable to zero
iterates through each element in the array
adds each element to the sum

relational.description: takes an array of integers returns the sum of all values in the array

segmentation.code:
total = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        total += arr[i]
    return total
segmentation.explanation_portion: returns the sum of all values in the array
